Spells:
Accelerate Poison (D2 Tran): Poison affecting touched takes effect immediately or inflicts damage twice as often for half duration
Alter Self (AThousand Faces2 Tran): Self becomes small (+2 Dexterity) or medium (+2 Strength) humanoid for 20 min
Call Lightning (Weather3 Evoc): R300' 1 bolt/rd inflicts 3d6 HP (DC 14 Ref half) for 20 min or 10 bolts
Call Lightning Storm (D5 Evoc): R1200' 1 bolt/rd inflicts 5d6 HP (DC 16 Ref half) for 20 min or 15 bolts
Changestaff (D7 Tran): Touched staff becomes treant-like creature for 20 hr
Charm Animal (D1 Ench): R75' Target treats self as trusted friend for 20 hr (DC 12 Will neg)
Clashing Rocks (D9 Conj): R1200' Ranged touch inflicts 20d6 HP bludgeoning, knocked prone, and buried in rubble (DC 20 Ref not buried); missed target and creatures in path suffer 10d6 HP and knocked prone (DC 20 Ref half HP only)
Command Plants (D4 Tran): R75' 40 HD plant creatures in 15' radius obey self for 20 dy (DC 15 Will neg)
Control Weather (Weather7 Tran): Modifies seasonal weather in 2 mile radius for 4d12 hr
Control Winds (Weather6 Tran): R800' Changes wind direction and speed 6 levels in 800'x40' cylinder for 200 min
Euphoric Tranquility (D8 Ench): Touched treats all as friends (DC 19 Will after attacked neg 1 rd), suffers half speed for 20 rd
Feast Of Ashes (D2 Tran): R75' Target suffers starvation (DC 13 Fort neg) and eating causes 1 rd nausea (DC 12 Fort neg) for 40 dy
Feather Step (D1 Tran): R75' Target treats difficult terrain as normal terrain for 200 min
Finger Of Death (D8 Necr): R75' Target suffers 200 HP (DC 19 Fort 3d6+20 HP)
Fog Cloud (Weather2 Conj): R300' Fog in 20' radius obscures vision for 200 min
Freedom Of Movement (D4 Abju): Touched moves freely for 200 min
Greater Dispel Magic (D6 Abju): R300' Self d20+20 check vs. 11+caster level cancels spells or effects in 20' radius
Greater Magic Fang (D3 Tran): R75' target natural weapon gains +4 attack and damage for 20 hr
Grove Of Respite (D4 Conj): R75' Creates 20' radius grove that reports intruders and provides water and fruit that feeds 8 and heals 1 HP for 40 hr

Hide From Animals (D1 Abju): 20 touched become imperceptible to animals for 200 min
Ice Storm (Weather5 Evoc): R1200' Hail in 20' radius inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning, 2d6 HP cold, -4 Perception for 20 rd

Mass Cure Critical Wounds (D9 Conj): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius heal (undead suffer) 4d8+20 HP (DC 20 Will half)
Mass Owl's Wisdom (D6 Tran): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius gain +4 Wisdom for 20 min
Mending (D0 Tran): R10' Repairs minor damage to 1 lb object

Poison (D3 Necr): Touched suffers -1d3 Constitution/rd for 6 rd (DC 14 Fort neg)

Regenerate (D9 Conj): Touched regrows maims, heals 4d8+20 HP, eliminates fatigue, exhaustion, and nonlethal damage

Speak With Animals (D1 Divi): Self converses w/animals for 20 min

Stormbolts (D8 Evoc): Targets in 30' radius suffer 20d8 HP electricity and stunned 1 rd (DC 19 Fort half HP only)

Swarm Skin (D6 Tran): Self flesh transforms into controlled insect swarms until destroyed or ordered to return to bones
Tree Shape (D2 Tran): Self becomes tree for 20 hr
True Seeing (D7 Divi): Touched sees through 120' darkness, illusion, and invisibility for 20 min
Unhallow (D5 Evoc): 40' radius from touched gives +2 AC and saves vs. good, suppresses mental control, bars contact by summoned good creatures, gives negative channeling +4 DC and positive channeling -4 DC, and evokes bane spell
Wall Of Stone (D6 Conj): R300' Creates 20 5' x 5 inch thick permanent stone wall
Warp Wood (D2 Tran): R75' Warps 20 wooden objects in 20' radius (DC 13 Will neg)
Whirlwind (Weather8 Evoc): R1200' Wind in 10' radius inflicts 3d6 HP, then 1d8 HP/rd for 20 rd (DC 19 Ref neg)
Magic Notes:
Wisdom Druid Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level D1
A Thousand Faces: May use Alter Self effects at will
Forge Ring: Create and mend magic rings
Heighten Spell: Increase chosen spell level
Lightning Lord: Call Lightning 20 bolts/dy
Spontaneous Casting: May cast domain spell in place of prepared spell
Wild Shape: Change into creature of size diminutive-huge/elemental/plant for 16 hr 7/dy
